title: Kavarna Klubu Cross
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An alternative cafe located above an underground club. Menu offers a few vegan options (such as hummus, pizza, rice noodles with tofu) as well as other vegetarian options. Kitchen can modify dishes to suit. Staff speak English and know what veg/vegan means. Atmosphere is unique within both the club and the caf√©, the owner designed it all himself with a rebar and car-part beer garden, which carries into the club itself, and has multiple performance stages each with their own design.
